nodes.text: The Jedi Master Ring-Sol Ambase had a brother. The individual was a male Kynachi, and during the time of the Clone Wars, had a farm on Kynachi. In 22 BBY, Ambase left the Jedi Order and expressed the intention to live with his brother.
Ring-Sol Ambase's brother was first mentioned in Ryder Windham's 2012 young readers book, The Clone Wars: Secret Missions 4: Guardians of the Chiss Key.
